action.content:
You are a customer in a restaurant. Here is a description of what you'd like to order:

WHAT: Restaurant
APPETIZER: Antipasti
DRINK: Juice
MAIN-DISH: Burrito
DESSERT: Cookies
SALAD: Tomato

The waiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the waiter will start with WAITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Have you informed the waiter what appetizers you wish? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I haven't informed the waiter yet.
Answer for APPETIZER valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the waiter been informed about your choice for drinks? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter has not been informed about the drinks yet.
Answer for DRINK valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you believe the waiter knows what to bring you for the main part of the meal? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter does not know what to bring for the main part of the meal.
Answer for MAIN-DISH valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the waiter asked about your choice for dessert? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the waiter has not asked about the dessert choice yet.
Answer for DESSERT valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Can the waiter already know what salad you are ordering? Please answer yes or no.
Answer for SALAD valid after 1 tries.
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the waiter what appetizers you wish? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, I haven't informed the waiter yet.

probes.question: ME: Has the waiter been informed about your choice for drinks? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter has not been informed about the drinks yet.

probes.question: ME: Do you believe the waiter knows what to bring you for the main part of the meal? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter does not know what to bring for the main part of the meal.

probes.question: ME: Has the waiter asked about your choice for dessert? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: No, the waiter has not asked about the dessert choice yet.

probes.question: ME: Can the waiter already know what salad you are ordering? Please answer yes or no.
